definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: The primitive and uncivilized nature of my life made me feel like a giant reptile during the Cretaceous or Jurassic periods.
sentences.chinese: 其荒莽无文，恍若白垩纪侏罗纪的一只大爬虫。

sentences.english: A large amount of Dinosaurs skeleton fossils are discovered in Upper Cretaceous strata at the Meipu Town, Yunxian County of Hubei Province.
sentences.chinese: 湖北省郧县梅铺镇晚白垩世地层中发现大量恐龙化石。

sentences.english: This paper deals with the characteristics of the Qibao-Shan caldera in early Cretaceous.
sentences.chinese: 本文论述了七宝山早白垩世破火山口的特征。

sentences.english: He chalked his billiard cue again and again.
sentences.chinese: 他一再用白垩粉擦他的球杆尖。

sentences.english: Results During 9 months follow-up period, the lesions still can be seen.
sentences.chinese: 结果9个月观察期内白垩斑仍可发现。

sentences.english: From the view of strati graphy they all belong to the cretaceous period.
sentences.chinese: 从地层学上看，它们都属于白垩纪。

sentences.english: From the Cretaceous Period to the Cenozoic Period, the volcanism was mainly related to the rifting;
sentences.chinese: 从白垩纪至新生代，火山作用主要与裂谷作用有关。

sentences.english: The Cretaceous Period was about 120 million years ago.
sentences.chinese: 白垩纪时代大约是一千二百万年以前。

sentences.english: The stratigraphic contact shows that the Baidafan Formation is volcanic rocks of Early Cretaceous age.
sentences.chinese: 地层接触关系表明白大畈组为早白垩世火山岩。

sentences.english: In the eastern Kuche Depression, Mesozoic Cretaceous and Cenozoic Tertiary are the main depositis.
sentences.chinese: 库车坳陷东部中新生代地层主要发育白垩系和第三系。

sentences.english: The value of TTI shows that hydrocarbon is largely generated at late Cretaceous for the primary source rocks in Chagan sag.
sentences.chinese: TTI计算表明其主要烃源岩主要生油期为晚白垩世。

sentences.english: Cretaceous sandstone reservoir is of primary pore type.
sentences.chinese: 白垩系储层以原生孔隙为主。

sentences.english: The Fangshan granodiorite pluton of Lower Cretaceous occupies the middle of core.
sentences.chinese: 核部有强力侵位的早白垩世的房山花岗闪长岩株。

sentences.english: They date back some 98 million years to the mid-Cretaceous period.
sentences.chinese: 这些恐龙是9800万年前中白垩纪时期的动物。

sentences.english: It is a heteropic product synchronous with the Heishidu Formation and deposited in the early Cretaceous.
sentences.chinese: 与黑石渡组为同期异相产物，属于早白垩世沉积。

sentences.english: The chalky scales that cover coccolithophores color the water milky white or bright blue.
sentences.chinese: 覆盖白垩表的颗石藻将水面染成乳白色或者浅蓝色。

definition: Permian (geological period 292-250m years ago)/also written 二疊紀|二叠纪
